entries.npc_reset_2: You're kidding, right? I should have known better than to rely on some stranger. I got nothing for you. Come back if you develop a spine.
entries.npc_reset_1: You're kidding, right? I should have known better than to rely on some stranger. I got nothing for you. Come back if you develop a spine.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.

entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.

entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.notit_1: This ain't the ledger, pal. Where's the ledger?
entries.npc_breech_1: Do I know you? Did you place a bet on the last swoop races? Wait! I don't know you! Keep away!
entries.npc_failure_1: You couldn't get a ledger from a harmless bookie? I was obviously talking to the wrong person. See ya.
entries.npc_noloc_1: I'll find out where that little worm is hiding and then you can get me what I want.
entries.npc_work_1: Did you get me that ledger yet? I need it to conduct some business, pal.
entries.npc_reward_1: Hey, hey, now this is the sort of result I expect from a true professional. You should go talk to my friend Luthin Dlunar in Bela Vistal. He's always looking for promising new talent.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: You want to do this or not?
entries.npc_4_1: You know, little things like bet amounts, odds, who has faith in you and who doesn't - the kind of thing that someone like me needs to know.
entries.npc_3_1: Beat it then! I got work to do!
entries.npc_2_1: All right then. The guy you're looking for is an Ishi Tib named Gleeb Tchotle. He's not likely to hand over his ledger, which he keeps on his person at all times, so you might have to persuade him to hand it over. Oh and if he ends up demised, I won't shed any tears.
entries.npc_1_1: You like swoop races? Maybe you've heard of me. Name's Serji-X Arrogantus, best swoop racer in the Core Worlds. And if you ever hear anyone say that Ingar Ominaz is best, then you know you're dealing with an idiot. So how would you feel about helping a celebrity out? There's this bet handler who's made a lot of money off me over the years. Recently I asked him to share some
information but the ungrateful worm refuses. Now does that seem like a friend to you? If you can get me his bet ledger, I'd certainly pay handsomely for it. Want to get on my good side?
entries.npc_reset: You're kidding, right? I should have known better than to rely on some stranger. I got nothing for you. Come back if you develop a spine.
entries.cantwork: I'm a bit busy right now, and by the look of it, so are you. Come back when you get some free time.
entries.next: You done good, friend. I don't need you anymore. Though I do appreciate someone who knows how to take orders. Keep checking back with me now and again.
